attributes.action: Reduced Road Tax on LPG converted (dual fuel) cars
attributes.additional_details:
Older vehicles (registered before 2001) converted to LPG should have reduced road tax rates.  i.e. £0 road tax for emissions of less than 100g per km

This would boost employment at good garages (LPGUK Authorised) doing LPG conversions.

Examples of tax bands (extra urban economy)
40-50 mpg £0 tax with LPG
30-40 mpg £100 tax with LPG
25-30 mpg £200 tax with LPG
20-25 mpg £300 tax with LPG
<20 mpg £400 tax with LPG

This would help the poorest who still need a car for work and give them the choice of having the lowest possible costs.
